text: Core is the first album by the American rock band Stone Temple Pilots. It was released on September 29, 1992 through Atlantic Records. The album made #1 on the Billboard Heatseekers chart and #3 on the Billboard 200. It was the band's best-selling album. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Scott Weiland, except where noted. ==Charts== Year Chart Position 1992 Heatseekers 1 1993 The Billboard 200 3 UK Albums Chart 27 Canadian RPM Albums Chart 8 ==References== Category:1992 albums
title: Core (Stone Temple Pilots album)
